channel.title: Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?"

item.title: Re: Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?
item.content:encoded: If you're bingoing and short on note pages (or the enemy is immune), there's a great RedEye jutsu that nullifies all damage to you that round â€¦ it's the best use for arrows I've found, especially trying to get the Tote.

item.title: Re: Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?
item.content:encoded: If you're specifically looking for allies, Stripey's ability also stacks with Nadeshiko's.

item.title: Re: Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?
item.content:encoded:
Regular or reaper doesn't matter for arrow drops from Fletch. If you have him in your party he drops them at the same rate wherever you take him.

Stripeypants ability does double the chance of finding Reaper allies, but not normal allies.

item.title: Re: Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?
Are using the attacks that use holy arrow useful?
item.content:encoded:
Even in regular world missions, and do the arrows drop frequently if you Fletch in your party.

Another question sort of related is dos Stripey Pants ability work on double chance on obtaining allies also?
